version_description:
1.Supported viewing the courseware in landscape on class, and optimized the default strategy to enter the home page and news!
2.Continuously fixed existing problems.If you have problems, come to update try it!

1. Fix the problem that APP has no learning record when watching live broadcast.
2. Fix the problem that some phone models cannot enter courseware operation details page through messages.
3. Interactive live broadcast allows cooperative teachers to access the receiver.
4. Announcement experience optimization.
It is recommended that all users update ~

1.To concentrate more on learningï¼Œit keeps the screen bright while lesson gose on.
2.In the split-screen mode of iPad class, you can drag pictures to other applications, making it more convenient to take notes.
3.Optimizations are made.
